All Classes and Interfaces|All Packages|Serialized Form

O

Order - Class in model
Order represents the model of an order, having the ids of itself, the client, product, the price per unit of the product, the quantity desired and the total to be paid.
Order() - Constructor for class model.Order
 
OrderBLL - Class in bll
OrderBLL contains an instance variable of a Controller object, a ClientDAO, a ProductDAO and an OrderDAO.
OrderBLL(OrderDAO, ClientDAO, ProductDAO, Controller) - Constructor for class bll.OrderBLL
 
OrderBLL.CreateOrderListener - Class in bll
It firstly gets the inputs from the GUI window and places them in an ArrayList.Then a Product object and a Client one are instantiated, being used the findById methods from ProductDAO and ClientDAO.
OrderDAO - Class in dao
OrderDAO extends AbstractDAO with the parameter Order
OrderDAO() - Constructor for class dao.OrderDAO
 
OrderView - Class in presentation
OrderView represents the GUI interface that is used to create an order, having the user input the id of the product, the client and the quantity desired
OrderView() - Constructor for class presentation.OrderView
